Message.Title: CCUR Ready to Skyrocket
Message.Msg: CCUR is probably the most undervalued stock on the NASDAQ today and the next to skyrocket. Its only $6.60 with 8.72mm shares outstanding and a market cap of $57.55mm. It has $24.6mm in cash and no debt. Enterprise value is only $33mm or just 0.52X its trailing revenue of $63mm. Their 2Q 2013 EPS was up 100% from 1Q 2013 and their 1Q 2013 EPS was up 100% from 4Q 2012. Their 3Q 2013 EPS is due out at the end of April! If you watch video on demand using your cable TV service and subscribe to Time Warner Cable, Charter, Cox, or Bright House, CCUR provides your VOD service and they just signed another huge unnamed top 5 North American pay-TV company for VOD services! CCUR also just signed a huge multi-screen TV deal with Virgin Media (VMED) the largest cable TV company in the UK. Their EPS is likely to continue exploding in the quarters ahead and the stock could quickly double or triple!
